SEARCH
Package Actor

Class PingPongActor

java.lang.Object
Actor.Actor
Actor.PingPongActor
All Implemented Interfaces:
SuperInterface
public class PingPongActor extends Actor
The PingPongActor class is a subclass of the Actor class. It receives a message and sends a random insult from a predefined list of insults to the sender of the message.

  • Constructor Summary

    PingPongActor(String name)
    Constructor that creates a new PingPongActor with the given name and loads a list of predefined insults
